RelatedSentence: The missing spot welds in the  car 's  structure are critical enough that their absence could affect the crashworthiness of the electric hatchback .

Nissan is recalling 211 Leaf EVs in the U.S. ( and another 65 in Canada ) built between February 28 and March 12 of this year to inspect them to see whether or not a series of six spot welds are present in the motor compartment .

Nissan is recalling 211 Leaf EVs in the U.S. ( and another 65 in Canada ) built between February 28 and March 12 of this year to inspect them to see whether or not a series of six spot welds are present in the motor compartment .

The recall does n't go into effect until the middle of June , but in the meantime , owners can contact Nissan at 1-800-647-7261 or NHTSA 's Vehicle Safety Hotline at 1-888-327-4236 ( TTY 1-800-424-9153 ) .
